title: Follow Up on an Online Lead
description: An agent receives a new lead from Zillow who is interested in one of their listings.

tasks.description: Immediately respond to the lead via text message to introduce yourself and ask about their availability for a call.
tasks.expected_outcome: A response is sent within 5 minutes of receiving the lead.

tasks.description: Set up the lead on an automated email drip campaign with information about the property and similar listings.
tasks.expected_outcome: The lead is added to the correct CRM workflow.

tasks.description: Call the lead at the agreed-upon time to discuss their needs and schedule a showing.
tasks.expected_outcome: A showing is scheduled or the lead's search criteria are clarified.
